channel.title: Why can I still wear it?

item.title: Why can I still wear it?
item.dc:creator: @Morgarath Morgarath
item.description:
@Morgarath wrote:

Ok, I tried changing my things around so I can’t wear a attack cape with 1 attack (tried making it 99 only).

Heres my code:

[code]

if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14073 == true) {// Evan`
}
if (playerLevel[0] <= 98 && playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14073) { // If you are lvl 98 or lower you cannot wear cape!
remove(playerEquipment[playerCape], 1);
sendMessage(“You Need 99 attack To Wear This Cape!”);
}
[/code]

My source is HiyaScape… Which is internaly CzarScape.

Help is appreciated ^.^

Read full topic
item.source: Why can I still wear it?
